General.Name: New Horizon Group Ltd
General.Description: New Horizon Group Ltd. develops and invests in real estate properties in the United States, Romania, Poland, and Latvia. It develops residential and commercial properties. The company was formerly known as Unami Shiluvim Enterprise and Development Ltd. and changed its name to New Horizon Group Ltd. in February 2007. New Horizon Group Ltd. was founded in 1979 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.
General.Address: 7 Menachem Begin Street, Ramat Gan, Israel, 52681
